feature.label: openconfigurator
feature.description: openCONFIGURATOR features description - Support for redundant MN configuration. - Support for modular nodes. - Multi-project support. - Install and use it in any eclipse(3.8 or later) variants. - Update notification via eclipse default updates. - Backward compatibility for openCONFIGURATOR 1.4.x projects.
